short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync your open tabs and bookmarks to Chillr.io, and access the knowledge you forgot to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Push your open tabs and bookmarks to Chillr.io and have them at your fingertips, without the clutter.

You consume a huge amount of information online. You want to read all those pages, but then life happens. 

So Chillr learns for you!  Remembering all that extra information whenever it becomes useful in the future. The more you sync, the more you'll have in your memories later on.
